title: L.A. Public Library retro block font (Deco?)
content:
Anyone know any fonts that are close?

I'm sure I've seen some. (Mostra, Aprille, and a few others are vaguely similar but not close enough.)

Thanks!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LA Library font - isolated.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017004046/http:/typophile.com/files/LA%20Library%20font%20-%20isolated_0.jpg) | 17.61 KB |
author: glenn ira

comments.content:
Terrific, yes, thank you -- looks like some characters are extremely close to Neutraface and some are extremely close to Le Havre (including their alternates), which was also suggested to me.

[http://www.insignedesign.com/Typeface.aspx?FamilyName=Le%20Havre](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017004046/http:/www.insignedesign.com/Typeface.aspx?FamilyName=Le%20Havre "http://www.insignedesign.com/Typeface.aspx?FamilyName=Le%20Havre")

These are perfect, thanks!
